Text.Page:
Blast it! The villagers trying to rebuild the settlement keep getting attacked by {@LinkCreature:31#2#ossugon icelords} and {@LinkCreature:31#5#frosted skeletal thralls}.

Meanwhile, they're telling me they're out of ash for cement! So let's kill two birds with one stone, so to speak.

Kill those undead and collect their bones. We'll see if that will do the trick.

Well done, .

I know this isn't technically the right sort of ash for the job, but those undead are so tenacious, the mix should be sturdy, at least. Ha!
We can talk when those monsters are dead.
